text: Middlesbrough is a town in North Yorkshire in northeast England. About 135,000 people live there. It is part of North Yorkshire. The name is often spelt incorrectly as 'Middlesborough' but 'Middlesbrough' is correct. The town is sometimes called Boro by people who live in the town or near it. ==Sports== It has a Championship football club: Middlesbrough F.C.. Category:Towns in North Yorkshire Category:Port cities and towns of the North Sea Category:Port cities and towns of England
title: Middlesbrough
